fields.text: Thank you for calling Fin in San Francisco, where we help you reclaim your time and focus on what matters most.
For support with your Fin tools, press [INDEX].
For assistance with setup and integration, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a Fin specialist for setup and integration.
For troubleshooting and bug reports, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a Fin support engineer for troubleshooting and bug reporting.
To learn about our productivity solutions, press [INDEX].
For a walkthrough of key features, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our Fin product team for a feature overview.
To discuss enterprise pricing and plans, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our Fin sales team for pricing and plan details.
